tool_description: Evaluates comprehensive risk profiles for vendors including operational, financial, security, and strategic risks.

vendor_id.description: Unique identifier for vendor to assess risks

project_criticality.description: Project criticality level: low, medium, high, or critical

risk_tolerance_level.description: Organizational risk tolerance: conservative, moderate, or aggressive

assessment_timeframe.description: Risk assessment timeframe: short_term, medium_term, or long_term

error_messages: Vendor not found: The specified vendor_id does not exist
Invalid project criticality: Must be one of [low, medium, high, critical]
Invalid risk tolerance: Must be one of [conservative, moderate, aggressive]
Invalid assessment timeframe: Must be one of [short_term, medium_term, long_term]
Risk assessment incomplete: Unable to complete risk evaluation due to insufficient data
usage: Specify vendor_id, risk_categories, and project_criticality. Adjust risk_tolerance_level and assessment_timeframe based on organizational context.

overall_risk_rating.description: Overall vendor risk rating: low, medium, high, or critical

risk_score.description: Quantitative risk score from 0-100 (higher = more risk)

operational_risk_level.description: Operational risk level: low, medium, high, or critical

financial_risk_level.description: Financial risk level: low, medium, high, or critical

security_risk_level.description: Security risk level: low, medium, high, or critical

key_risk_factors.description: List of primary risk factors identified

risk_summary.description: Summary of risk assessment findings and recommendations
